newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan's Far Eastern H1 profit plunges.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan's Far Eastern H1 profit plunges.

text.p: NOTE - Far Eastern Textile Ltd is Taiwan's largest textile maker. A company spokeswoman attributed the profit plunge to the sluggish sales and prices in the polyester fibre industry and smaller non-operating profits in the first half of 1996 than a year earlier. The firm targeted a 1996 pretax profit of T$1.03 billion on sales of T$31 billion, she said.
